chart.title: Human rights index
chart.subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by [V-Dem](#dod:v-dem). It captures the extent to which people are free from government torture, political killings, and forced labor; they have property rights; and enjoy the freedoms of movement, religion, expression, and association. The variable ranges from 0 to 1 (most rights).
